title: update taking over 200 min
body: patch was stuck at 0% for over 40 min I restarted and now its estimated at 260 why is this tiny update taking forever?

replies.body: There could be a few factors here, most commonly connection or permissions issues getting in the way.  If you're stuck at 0%, there is a good chance something is blocking your game files from being read.  Start with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access, and let me know if that helps!
